title: Drawing, "Ceiling Design", ca. 1760–89
inscribed: Inscribed in pencil by the artist with a color key.
provenance: Piancastelli Collection; purchased from Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertically oriented; allegory of painting with inscribed color key.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ceiling Design", ca. 1760–89.
ca. 1760–89. Graphite on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6825.
